item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, October 3, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Canvas is a new way to write and code with ChatGPT (137 points | 79 comments)
2. Were RNNs All We Needed? (40 points | 7 comments)
3. Serving 70B-Scale LLMs Efficiently on Low-Resource Edge Devices [pdf] (131 points | 45 comments)
4. Dance training superior to physical exercise in inducing brain plasticity (2018) (119 points | 65 comments)

6. FLUX1.1 [pro] – New SotA text-to-image model from Black Forest Labs (95 points | 58 comments)
7. Solving methane mysteries with satellite imagery (88 points | 13 comments)
8. Most gamers prefer single-player games (70 points | 58 comments)
9. Activeloop (YC S18) Hiring an AI Search Engineer to Ship Fast and Accurate Search ( | hide)
10. Patent troll Sable pays up, dedicates all its patents to the public (465 points | 138 comments)
11. Announcing the Tech for Palestine Incubator (9 points | 2 comments)
12. Starlink offering free internet access for 30 days for Hurricane Helene victims (36 points | 7 comments)
13. The Fastest Mutexes (850 points | 309 comments)
14. The latter half of October, the maintainer goes offline (15 points | 2 comments)
15. Determinism in League of Legends: Implementation (2017) (67 points | 25 comments)
16. Modifications to GPU Hardware to Benefit Signed Distance Fields (40 points | 6 comments)
17. An adult fruit fly brain has been mapped (539 points | 174 comments)
18. NSO Should Lose Spyware Case for Discovery Violations, Meta Says (37 points | 11 comments)
19. France's oldest treasure hunt has been solved (144 points | 30 comments)
20. Ever: Exact Volumetric Ellipsoid Rendering for Real-Time View Synthesis (60 points | 12 comments)
21. Gamma radiation is produced in large tropical thunderstorms (123 points | 87 comments)
22. Terminal colours are tricky (268 points | 112 comments)
23. A Commentary on the Sixth Edition of the Unix Operating System [pdf] (1977) (78 points | 15 comments)
24. The forgotten story of Britain’s perilous bid to fly around the world (6 points | 1 comment)
25. Type-erased generic functions for C: A modest non-proposal (73 points | 48 comments)
26. Two AI review your favourite movie scripts (NotebookLM) (4 points | discuss)
27. Nuance and Nuisance: On the Village Voice (11 points | discuss)
28. In Mexico’s underwater caves, a glimpse of artifacts, fossils and human remains (175 points | 44 comments)
29. Ask HN: What happens to ".io" TLD after UK gives back the Chagos Islands? (189 points | 150 comments)
30. AMD GPU Inference (262 points | 92 comments)
